file.name: api.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.2
info:
  title: "API"
  version: "1.0.0"
  contact:
    name: Кравченков Александр
    email: kravchenkov@surfstudio.ru

paths:

  /api/v1.1/auth:
    post:
      summary: Метод для отправки логина и пароля на сервер. Первый фактор авторизации.
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              oneOf:
                - $ref: "models.yaml#/components/schemas/AuthRequest"
                - $ref: "models.yaml#/components/schemas/SilentAuthRequest"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: "Успех"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "models.yaml#/components/schemas/AuthResponse"
            
        default:
          $ref: "../common/errors.yaml#/components/responses/ApiErrorResponse"

    /api/v1.1/superAuth:
    get:
      responses:
        '200':
          description: todo
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "models.yaml#/components/schemas/AuthResponse"
    delete:
      responses:
        '204':
          description: todo
    put:
      responses:
        '201':
          description: todo
